named-native-query.name: CardTiming.findMostDueCardInDeck
named-native-query.query: SELECT * FROM timings INNER JOIN cards ON cards.id = timings.card_id INNER JOIN decks ON decks.id = cards.deck_id WHERE cards.deck_id = :deckId AND (CAST(DATEADD(DAY, repetition_interval, last_review_date) AS DATE) <= CURRENT_DATE() OR repetition_number = 0) ORDER BY DATEADD(DAY, repetition_interval, last_review_date) LIMIT 1
